name: Assiniboine Memorial Curling Club
description: Seasonal location. Games available to the public in the 2nd floor lounge. No change machine available. T.N.A. and Monopoly accept loonies only, all others accept quarters only.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Coin issues fixed.

machine_conditions.comment: Coin issues fixed.
Coin slots taped shut
Disregard, ball is no longer stuck, & left coin slot works (loonies only).
Stuck ball above left scoop, none of the coin slots are working or they are taped up

Machine already has issues. Upper left flipper is having switch issues or is shorting out. Flipper will work for two or three flips, then buzzes and goes crazy, then won't work for about 20-30 flips, then comes back for a few shots, then dies again. Sometimes lags 2-3 seconds from flipper push.
Brand new

name: Phantom Amusement
description: Located next to the Grass Roots Prairie Kitchen inside The Forks Market.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Got a colour DMD machine is looking awesome

machine_conditions.comment: Got a colour DMD machine is looking awesome
Upper flipper fixed. Playing great!
Tilt mech adjusted. Should be normal now
Shaker motor tilts game.
Upper flipper fixed. Back in service
Upper flipper not working

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Playing well

machine_conditions.comment: Playing well
plays well overall! watch out on the left ramp / drac catapult return, as balls may roll out of the inlane and into the left outlane.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Game plays well

machine_conditions.comment: Game plays well
Groot now registers balls as normal.
Groot head switch needs adjustment as it will not find the ball every few locks

location_machine_xrefs.condition: center target adjusted, playing very well! (target does bend to the side over long periods of time.)

machine_conditions.comment: center target adjusted, playing very well! (target does bend to the side over long periods of time.)

center target may become unresponsive after a firm hit. on closer inspection, it seems to be getting caught on something: it will flex all the way back on hit but not bend back into place; further shots / solenoid pulses jiggle it free.

Machine serviced. Replaced rubber that was too big at top right lane (ball now goes through 100% without shaking game). Also took target down at Center, adjusted switch and re aligned and works 100% now
knight target still seems to be a 50/50 if it registers upon a solid hit between the posts. (no salt, just repeatedly observed -may need some testing)
Target adjusted and works fine now thanks.
Super (Knight) target is only registering the hardest possible hits to it.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: theatre does not register any shots. bob's trapdoor on the left orbit does not open (normally opens for crazy modes & locks, but left orbit still works for these.) leaning to the left.

machine_conditions.comment: theatre does not register any shots. bob's trapdoor on the left orbit does not open (normally opens for crazy modes & locks, but left orbit still works for these.) leaning to the left.

plays well!

location_machine_xrefs.condition: battering ram toy currently working much more smoothly, but lock ramp behaviour still seems off when locking balls - may need further testing by other players

machine_conditions.comment: battering ram toy currently working much more smoothly, but lock ramp behaviour still seems off when locking balls - may need further testing by other players

Check the switches on the centre lock ramp. 1 of them needs an adjustment because it's very occasionally triggered even though no ball contacts it. Also occasionally when locking a ball, the game doesn't spit out a new ball until it does a ball search.

And I agree that the battering ram is a bit stiff. It still works if you hit it absolutely right, but sometimes when hitting it dead in hard, it barely moves.
plays well, and has a beautiful ColorDMD. battering ram is a little stiff, backhanding recommended to knock it straight up into the target.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: right flipper coil assembly replaced, playing great!

machine_conditions.comment: right flipper coil assembly replaced, playing great!
Right flipper not working
Game playing very well
out of order with a ball stuck in the lock. "Adjust Failure" when powered on.
Lane guide found and put back in
Barrier fell over near left flipper. Ball just falls down left gutter and does flow to left flipper.
Game only ball searches if no switches are hit for 5-10 seconds in play. Spinner working fine. Verified plays very well
game regularly starts ball search routines during active play. spinner doesn't work, not that it's worth much otherwise.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Could not replicate switch issue. Skill shot kicker has been welded and has to be positioned a certain way to work. Need a new weld mount to fix. Looking for one currently. But still very playable

machine_conditions.comment: Could not replicate switch issue. Skill shot kicker has been welded and has to be positioned a certain way to work. Need a new weld mount to fix. Looking for one currently. But still very playable
in addition to drop target issue in below comment, skillshot lane kicker (below the "skee-ball" holes) is having trouble kicking the ball into play.

figured out why the ramp value skyrockets - whenever the topmost pirate drop target is down, it repeatedly registers as hit; since drops jack up the ramp's value, this causes it to reach its max of 15M after a few seconds.
Game plays well
After pressing start says 3 balls missing.
display tends to glitch out (showed a page of the operator's menu last time I saw a glitch (??)), but rest assured the game is still keeping track of scores properly.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: center shot confirmed to work normally again for mode starts. right ramp seems to not register shots about half the time - slow balls less likely to register, fast balls more likely. (maybe this is intended behaviour, who knows)

machine_conditions.comment: center shot confirmed to work normally again for mode starts. right ramp seems to not register shots about half the time - slow balls less likely to register, fast balls more likely. (maybe this is intended behaviour, who knows)

Score not correct giving 3 million a pop bumper hit

Extensively checked out and play tested and concluded game is functioning properly. Did note that you do score each time you enter and exit house. And sometimes takes 10+ shots when arrow flashing to start mode.
center shot does not register towards starting haunts - typically only seems to count as an orbit shot (advancing Driving Me Crazy round.) check ramp optos?

comet exit switch only seems to trip on slow-rolling balls. dunk drop target does not stand up (jitters a bit on ball start, solenoid seems to be trying to fire?) which makes bonus advance impossible.
